content: I'm thinking of trying out other types of milk alternatives, like cashew milk or hazelnut milk, in my smoothies and oatmeal. Do you have any suggestions on how to make them at home, or are there any store-bought brands you would recommend? By the way, I've been experimenting with different flavors of popcorn at home, and I recently tried a lemon-herb flavor with lemon zest and dried thyme that turned out amazing!
